mapper.select: SELECT cast(AES_DECRYPT(guest_name, #{aesKey}) as char) as guestName, cast(AES_DECRYPT(guest_phone, #{aesKey}) as char) as guestPhone, guest_password as guestPassword FROM guest where orders_no=#{ordersNo}
mapper.insert: insert into guest(orders_no, guest_name, guest_phone, guest_password) values( #{ordersNo}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestName}, #{aesKey}), AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestPhone}, #{aesKey}), SHA2(#{guestPassword}, 512) )
mapper.select: select a.orders_no as ordersNo, b.reg_date as regDate, b.status from ( select orders_no from guest where guest_name=AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestName}, #{aesKey}) and guest_phone=AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestPhone}, #{aesKey}) and guest_password=SHA2(#{guestPassword}, 512) ) a, orders b where a.orders_no=b.orders_no
select count(*) from guest where orders_no=#{ordersNo} and guest_name=AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestName}, #{aesKey}) and guest_phone=AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestPhone}, #{aesKey})
mapper.update: update guest set guest_password=SHA2(#{guestPassword}, 512) where orders_no=#{ordersNo} and guest_name=AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestName}, #{aesKey}) and guest_phone=AES_ENCRYPT(#{guestPhone}, #{aesKey})
